page.topic: Javascript function to specify Editor set/Editor
page.description: Defines a JavaScript function to call that calculates the Editor and Editor set to use for editing the field.

discussion.p: Specify the name of the Javascript function to call when this field is edited. The Javascript function takes 'settings' as an input parameter and must return an array containing the Editor set and Editor name to use to edit the field.
This option is only available if the *[ui:Method for specifying Editor set/Editor]* is set to "Javascript Function".

section.tip: You can use the *[ui:Assign name to mulitple fields]* link to set the Javascript Function for multiple fields in the FormView control.
